self.title: CDISC SEND Restraint Mode Response Terminology

definition: Terminology related to the means by which restraint was applied to the individual.
name: Restraint Mode Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Restraint Mode Response Terminology

terms.definition: Movement is restricted by both chemical and physical means.
Movement is restricted by chemical means.
Movement is restricted by manual means or device.
